rules.natural: Provided that the agent drinks vodka, if it is not the case that the agent wins the game, then the agent completes the mission.
The agent drinks vodka or the agent drinks whiskey.
The agent joins the agency, or if it is false that whenever the agent drinks whiskey then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's identity is compromised.
If the agent's cover is exposed, then the agent's identity is compromised.
Whenever the agent defects from the organization, the agent is loyal to the agency.

The agent defects from the organization, or if it is false that under the condition the agent drinks whiskey, the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's cover is exposed.
The agent is recruited by the rival, or if the agent defects from the organization, then the agent is not loyal to the agency.
The agent is trained by the handler, or the agent is not recruited by the rival.
Either the agent plays chess or the agent plays poker.
If the agent uses the laptop, then either the agent uses the decoder or the agent wins the game.
Provided that the agent plays poker, if it is not the case that the agent wins the game, then the agent completes the mission.
Whenever the agent makes strategic moves, if the agent plays chess, then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game.

Under the condition that the agent operates the drone, either the agent uses the scanner or, if it is not the case that the agent monitors vehicles or makes strategic moves, then the agent escapes surveillance.
If the agent flies the helicopter, then it is not the case that the agent is detected by radar.
Either the agent flies the helicopter or the agent pilots the jet.
Provided that the agent pilots the jet, the agent is not detected by radar.
Whenever the agent accesses the server, the agent uses the laptop.
The agent accesses the server or the agent downloads the blueprints.
The agent drives the van, or if the agent downloads the blueprints, then the agent uses the laptop.
If the agent hides in the safehouse, then it is not the case that the agent is caught by the police.
Whenever it is not the case that if the agent drinks whiskey then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, it is false that the agent's identity is compromised.
Provided that it is false that the agent escapes the compound or does not drive the van, the agent is caught by the police.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the agent escapes the compound or does not drive the van, the agent hides in the safehouse.
Whenever the agent does not operate the drone, the agent is detected by radar.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either the agent uses the decoder or the agent wins the game.

(A10 → (¬G → A9)).natural: Provided that the agent drinks vodka, if it is not the case that the agent wins the game, then the agent completes the mission.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: The agent drinks vodka or the agent drinks whiskey.

(A11 → (¬G → A9)).natural: Under the condition that the agent drinks whiskey, whenever the agent does not win the game, the agent completes the mission.

(A13 ∨ (¬(A11 → (¬G → A9)) → A12)).natural: The agent joins the agency, or if it is false that whenever the agent drinks whiskey then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's identity is compromised.

(A14 → A12).natural: If the agent's cover is exposed, then the agent's identity is compromised.

(A15 → A16).natural: Whenever the agent defects from the organization, the agent is loyal to the agency.

(A15 → ¬A16).natural: Provided that the agent defects from the organization, it is not the case that the agent is loyal to the agency.

(A15 ∨ (¬(A11 → (¬G → A9)) → A14)).natural: The agent defects from the organization, or if it is false that under the condition the agent drinks whiskey, the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's cover is exposed.

(A17 ∨ (A15 → ¬A16)).natural: The agent is recruited by the rival, or if the agent defects from the organization, then the agent is not loyal to the agency.

(A18 ∨ ¬A17).natural: The agent is trained by the handler, or the agent is not recruited by the rival.

(A19 → (¬G → A9)).natural: Under the condition that the agent plays chess, if the agent does not win the game, then the agent completes the mission.

(A19 ∨ A20).natural: Either the agent plays chess or the agent plays poker.

(A2 → (A1 ∨ G)).natural: If the agent uses the laptop, then either the agent uses the decoder or the agent wins the game.

(A20 → (¬G → A9)).natural: Provided that the agent plays poker, if it is not the case that the agent wins the game, then the agent completes the mission.

(A21 → (A19 → (¬G → A9))).natural: Whenever the agent makes strategic moves, if the agent plays chess, then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game.

(A22 ∨ A21).natural: The agent monitors vehicles or the agent makes strategic moves.

(A24 ∨ (¬(A22 ∨ A21) → A23)).natural: The agent uses the scanner, or if it is not the case that the agent monitors vehicles or makes strategic moves, then the agent escapes surveillance.

(A25 → (A24 ∨ (¬(A22 ∨ A21) → A23))).natural: Under the condition that the agent operates the drone, either the agent uses the scanner or, if it is not the case that the agent monitors vehicles or makes strategic moves, then the agent escapes surveillance.

(A27 → ¬A26).natural: If the agent flies the helicopter, then it is not the case that the agent is detected by radar.

(A27 ∨ A28).natural: Either the agent flies the helicopter or the agent pilots the jet.

(A28 → ¬A26).natural: Provided that the agent pilots the jet, the agent is not detected by radar.

(A3 → A2).natural: Whenever the agent accesses the server, the agent uses the laptop.

(A3 ∨ A4).natural: The agent accesses the server or the agent downloads the blueprints.

(A4 → A2).natural: Under the condition that the agent downloads the blueprints, the agent uses the laptop.

(A5 ∨ (A4 → A2)).natural: The agent drives the van, or if the agent downloads the blueprints, then the agent uses the laptop.

(A6 ∨ ¬A5).natural: The agent escapes the compound, or the agent does not drive the van.

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: If the agent hides in the safehouse, then it is not the case that the agent is caught by the police.

(¬(A11 → (¬G → A9)) → A12).natural: If it is false that whenever the agent drinks whiskey, then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's identity is compromised.

(¬(A11 → (¬G → A9)) → A14).natural: Provided that it is false that under the condition the agent drinks whiskey, the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, then the agent's cover is exposed.

(¬(A11 → (¬G → A9)) → ¬A12).natural: Whenever it is not the case that if the agent drinks whiskey then the agent completes the mission if they do not win the game, it is false that the agent's identity is compromised.

(¬(A22 ∨ A21) → A23).natural: If it is not the case that the agent monitors vehicles or makes strategic moves, then the agent escapes surveillance.

(¬(A6 ∨ ¬A5) → A7).natural: Provided that it is false that the agent escapes the compound or does not drive the van, the agent is caught by the police.

(¬(A6 ∨ ¬A5) → A8).natural: Under the condition that it is not the case that the agent escapes the compound or does not drive the van, the agent hides in the safehouse.

(¬(A6 ∨ ¬A5) → ¬A7).natural: If it is false that the agent escapes the compound or does not drive the van, then it is not the case that the agent is caught by the police.
